title: Someone hacked my account and im still logged in through the website. Help!
body: I dont know how to get my account back but it didnt log me out here.

replies.body: Oh noes!!! There's not a lot I can personally do here on the boards, but reach out to our accounts team using the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and you'll be back on the Rift in no time!
